org.displaytag.tld
Class TldTest

java.lang.Object
  junit.framework.Assert
      junit.framework.TestCase
          org.displaytag.tld.TldTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
junit.framework.Test
public class TldTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase

Reads tlds and check tag classes for declared attributes. This simple reports missing/invalid setters in tag classes. Basic tests only, other tests are performed by the maven-taglib plugin.

Version:
$Revision: 1155 $ ($Author: fgiust $)
Author:
Fabrizio Giustina

checkTld

public void checkTld(java.lang.String checkedTld)
              throws java.lang.Exception
Check the given tld. Assure then:
  • Any tag class is loadable
  • the tag class has a setter for any of the declared attribute
  • the type declared in the dtd for an attribute (if any) matches the type accepted by the getter

Parameters:
checkedTld - path for the tld to check, relative to basedir.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - any Exception generated during test.
